originalText.text: I’m a bit addicted to tanning and I come here a lot. The staff is absolutely amazing. Always friendly and they remember my name. With the number of people that they see daily that is no small feat. The beds are always clean and there are plenty of options. I come to tan but the staff is what makes the experience great.

originalText.text: Prices are different from other BBT locations just something to be aware of. Otherwise all good. Great staff , clean.

text.text: Prices are different from other BBT locations just something to be aware of. Otherwise all good. Great staff , clean.

originalText.text: I was very happy to end my relationship with this company today. When they bought out my contract with another tanning salon I accepted it as I had no other option, but the staff at that time was also so great. This salon changed management a year or so ago....and i just find going there was no longer a good experience. They always harrassed me about my sessions that didn't expire which I guess was part of the buy out. I had one non-expiring session today and tried to take advantage of their upgrade promotion today. I was told the upgrade bed is broken and they don't know when it will be fixed. This all on expiring tanning sessions? I pay more and they can't deliver. The guy at the desk, with limited math skills discussing the different options ask me what was my confusion. I told him I'm no longer confused, I'm finding a different tanning salon

originalText.text:
This is one of the worst beach bum locations I’ve been too. I’ve been to at least 3 different locations in NJ and can say hands down the NJ locations are much much better than this NY location. In this specific location, the staff was not aware of the % of reddening vs bronzing on the different levels of machines like they are in other locations. In other locations they show pictures of the machines and the levels so you know exactly what you are getting. I purchased a single diamond level tan , which is supposed to be ALL bronzing , and was red a couple of hours after the tan. (This is not typical for my type of skin). Paid for a top tier bed , and was clearly put in a lower tier bed.
Would never go here again. Aside from also not even having the protective goggles , they don’t even have the stickers you can put on your eyes for protection like ALL other beach bum locations.

originalText.text: I gave five stars because of the excellent staff and management, they are caring and provide great customer service. The hours and location are perfect, especially when everything else closes early since the pandemic. The beds here, for some reason never give the desired brown golden tan I’m accustomed to.
